availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Stark (Metcalfe County, KY, farmer and soldier )

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Farmer in Metcalfe County in 1860. Served as a captain in the Kentucky militia in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Metcalfe County, p. 872
KYR-0001-004-1372
Find A Grave, "Joseph Stark (September 12, 1836-July 7, 1913)," Memorial #101125185, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/101125185 (October 14, 2019).
